attributes.action: ensure the London 2012 Olympics logo is changed to reflect London, Britain and the Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new London 2012 Olympics logo is a disgrace and should not be allowed to represent London and the British people on a major international scale.  The logo will undoubtedly have a severe negaive impact on the British economy through portraying a nation so out of touch with modern design and marketing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
